actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide for a record of admission for permanent residence in the case of certain aliens who entered the United States prior to July 4, 1976.

summary.text: Immigration Status Adjustment Act - Directs the Attorney General to make a record of lawful admission for permanent residence for illegal aliens who meet specified conditions who were in the United States prior to July 4, 1976, and for certain aliens with nonimmigrant or parolee status. Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to subject employers who bring into the United States or harbor illegal aliens to a fine or imprisonment.

titles.title: A bill to provide for a record of admission for permanent residence in the case of certain aliens who entered the United States prior to July 4, 1976.
